member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.IHashFunction
member.summary: Common interface to non-cryptographic hash functions.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.IHashFunction.ComputeHash(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Computes hash value for given byte array.
member.returns: Hash value of the data as byte array.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.IHashFunction.ComputeHash(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Computes hash value for given stream.
member.returns: Hash value of data as byte array.

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.IHashFunction.HashSize
member.summary: Size of produced hash, in bits.
member.value: The size of the hash, in bits.

member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.IHashFunctionAsync
member.summary: Common interface to non-cryptographic hash functions.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.IHashFunctionAsync.ComputeHashAsync(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Computes hash value for given stream asynchronously.
member.returns: Hash value of data as byte array.
member.remarks: All stream IO is done via ReadAsync.
